#summary How to install.

= Introduction =

Compiled binary (.exe) is available for windows.
Archived source files (.tar.gz) is available for all platforms.

= Binary file (Windows) =

~~An installer is not currently available.~~
Just download the exe file from the downloads page and click on it to ~~run.~~ install.

Tested only with Windows 2000 and XP so far.

= Archive (Linux or Windows) =

== Requirements: ==
  * Python >= 2.4
  * WxPython 
  * Python Imaging Library

== To install ==
  * Download the archive and extract it.
  * Then run the setup.py as follows
  * python setup.py install
